comments.raw_text:
When I use, for example, a delicious bookmarklet, the entire window gets crunched into the resizeTo space requested.

Instead, when there is more than one tab currently open in that chrome window, we should create a rendering viewport of the requested size that is independent of the chrome window's size. I'm guessing that the dead space around the viewport could be treated similarly to the dead space that surrounds our FF4 alert dialog boxen.
